basic.floral_language:
Kalanchoe marnieriana 
Floriography: beautiful, tender, pretty
Is a pretty plant with leaves like Ping-Pong pads, slightly covered by white powders, many lateral buds along leaf edges, they may germinate roots once detached, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, leaves closely arranged, leaf edges turn pink, particularly charming, high ornamental value, 
Likes sunshine, tolerates to half shade, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, place under bright scattered light. Flowers sometimes, pink color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leaf edges turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
